Chapter 3 A simple data set I’ve loaded the data into a tibble named “hts” that has a column (variable) named “heights”: hts ## # A tibble: 100 × 1 ## heights ## <dbl> ## 1 154. ## 2 158. ## 3 160. ## 4 159. ## 5 163. ## 6 168. ## 7 164. ## 8 155. ## 9 168. ## 10 157. ## # … with 90 more rows These are the heights of 100 female humans (in cm). ggplot(hts, aes(x = heights)) + geom_histogram(fill = "gray", color = "black", binwidth = 2)
